Package totalcross.ui.media

Media (wav), Photo, and Sound beep/tone/disabling support classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MediaClipHandler  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Camera
    This class is used to enable the camera of the underlying device.
    MediaClip
    MediaClip is a sound clip.
    MediaClipEvent
    Events posted by a soundclip control.
    Sound
    Sound is used to play sounds such as beeps and tones and mp3.

Package totalcross.ui.media Description

Media (wav), Photo, and Sound beep/tone/disabling support classes.
